thread.title: Report That Trump Greeted Russian Envoy During Campaign Resurfaces
thread.title_full: Report That Trump Greeted Russian Envoy During Campaign Resurfaces

author: Allegra Kirkland
title: Report That Trump Greeted Russian Envoy During Campaign Resurfaces
text:
A report that President Donald Trump briefly met Russian ambassador Sergey Kislyak during the presidential campaign is recirculating this week amid renewed scrutiny of contacts Trump staffers had with Russian officials before the election.
Read More â†’
